Condition.name: QV Compare Group
Condition.Param: Measure unlimited QVs by inserting more conditions without enabling the reset box (make sure to check the same QV in "QV to Check"). Enable RESET to start a new check. Note that there may be multiple QVs with highest value.

Effect.name: ID Viewer
Effect.Param: This lets you search for a UNIT TYPE ID by listing the range you specify. It will only do one of the three, so specify only one.
Use the Search field below to scan for an ID that MATCHES the Unit Type you enter.
Use this to find the specific PROTOTYPE ID of the selected unit (or just go to your proto file).

Effect.name: Move to Self in Area (Center Unit)
Move From Area To Near Unit
QV 1- Start Highest or Lowest
Effect.Param: Have this effect ONCE in the trigger BEFORE using any of "QV Save Highest or Lowest" effects.

Effect.name: QV 2- Save Highest or Lowest
Effect.Param: The NAME of the QV with the highest or lowest value is saved to QVerHighLow (in same trigger only). Enter "+QVerHighLow+" in place of the QV name when you want to get the name of the QV with that value. Be sure to have the "QV Start Highest or Lowest" ONCE in the trigger BEFORE using this any number of times. Measure unlimited QVs in the same trigger by inserting more conditions without enabling the reset box (make sure to check the same QV in "QV to Check"). Enable RESET to start a new check. Note that there may be multiple QVs with highest or lowest value, in which the last QV will be used.

Param.dispName: From Player Number or 99 for ALL

QV Set Units in Area (Center Unit)
